name: Ruin's Hold
description:
Avoid mechanical and otherworldly dangers. Brave the depths and break free of Ruin's Hold.

"What a fool I was to venture alone. I must guard my lantern...and my wits..."

-----

HTC Vive and 2.5m x 2.5m play area are required.

Developer Chaperone style and low bounds opacity are recommended for enhanced presence.
